data.name: WIN Reality Baseball
data.description:
Become a better batter with WIN Reality. Used by top athletes, from pros to travel teams, WIN Reality lets baseball and softball athletes practice from the convenience of home. Subscriptions start as low as $29!

IMPROVE QUICKLY
WIN Reality helps players acquire skills seven times faster than traditional training methods alone. Many players level up their batting with just a few 15-minute WIN sessions per week.

CLUTCH MOMENTS
Clutch players aren't born. They're built. In Exhibition mode, play through "full-count, bottom of the ninth, bases loaded" situations. When the time comes, youâ€™ll be ready. 

MULTIPLAYER
Compete and train with other players at your level in our live multiplayer competitions hosted by a college or a pro hitting coach.

REAL COACHES
Each subscription comes with an assigned real-life coach from WIN Reality. Sign up for WIN Pro or Elite to have access to a personal coach all season long to unlock your true potential.

IMMERSIVE HITTING
A stunningly realistic baseball and softball simulation. You can swing with the Quest controller or use your own bat with the WIN Reality bat attachment.

MUSIC YOU LOVE
With six in-app radio stations, you can train to music that puts you in the zone.

HEAD-TO-HEAD PLAY
With the Live Pitch feature, you can connect your mobile phone to pitch to your friend, teammate, or family member!

Are you ready to step up to the plate?
